parameters.name: includeCount
parameters.description: Include `totalItems` and `totalPages` in the response if set. This option is very expensive, so should be avoided when possible.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the protocol list by the given type. Possible values are [created, modified]. Requires `order` parameter to be set.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Return search results in the given order. Possible values are 'asc' and 'desc'. Requires `sort` parameter to be set.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter protocols whose current state is one of the provided values. May be repeated: e.g. ?state=active&state=paused

parameters.name: modifiedAfter
parameters.description: Filter protocols modified after the given timestamp (inclusive). The timestamp must be in ISO-8601 format.

parameters.name: modifiedBefore
parameters.description: Filter protocols modified before the given timestamp (inclusive). The timestamp must be in ISO-8601 format.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Filter protocols created after the given timestamp (inclusive). The timestamp must be in ISO-8601 format.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Filter protocols created before the given timestamp (inclusive). The timestamp must be in ISO-8601 format.

200.description: All accessible protocol instances of this type
The protocol instance with this ID

totalItems.description: Total number of accessible protocol instances. Only included if the `includeCount` query parameter was set.

totalPages.description: Total number of accessible pages. Only included if the `includeCount` query parameter was set.
